safety_stop.description: Stops the user immediately if BMI is below FDA guidelines.

marketplace_aca.default_reason: Standard ACA Marketplace plans exclude weight loss medications.

MN.reason: MN Statute 62Q.474 mandates coverage for FDA-approved obesity medications.

IL.reason: BCBS IL coverage active but gated by strict Prior Authorization Quantitative Limits (PAQL).

WA.reason: Mandate pending for 2026 (SB 5353). Current status: Excluded.

tricare_for_life.reason: Statutory exclusion for TRICARE For Life (Medicare-eligible).

tricare_prime_select.reason: Covered with Step Therapy: Must fail Phentermine, Qsymia, and Contrave first.

veterans_affairs.reason: Covered (Non-Formulary). Requires 'MOVE!' program enrollment and 5% weight loss stopping rule.

red_list_carve_outs: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Michigan

green_list_managed.Google: Green (Managed): Coverage maintained as retention tool.
green_list_managed.Alphabet: Green (Managed): Coverage maintained as retention tool.
green_list_managed.Microsoft: Green (Conditional): Covered with PA. Perks+ reimbursement excludes prescriptions.
green_list_managed.Princeton: Green: Covered via OptumRx with tiered copays.
green_list_managed.Princeton University: Green: Covered via OptumRx with tiered copays.

yellow_list_restricted.University of Michigan: Yellow: 2-year lifetime limit and concurrent program required.
yellow_list_restricted.Mayo Clinic: Yellow: Coverage contingent on 'Mayo Clinic Weight Management Program' enrollment.
yellow_list_restricted.Federal Employee Program: Yellow: Tier 3 (High Cost) with strict PA rules.
yellow_list_restricted.FEP: Yellow: Tier 3 (High Cost) with strict PA rules.

NC.reason: Coverage reinstated for 2026 (starting Dec 2025) via direct manufacturer contracting. Strict Prior Authorization applies.

NJ.reason: Tiered Copay Penalty: $125/mo without lifestyle program, $45/mo with it.

TN.reason: 2026 Coinsurance increased to 25%; removed from preventive list.

FL.reason: Florida Blue/State Plan general exclusion for weight loss drugs.

Aetna.reason: Requires 'Lookback': 6-month weight management program history documented prior to start.

Cigna.reason: Standard PA requires 3 months behavioral modification. 'Encircle Rx' members may bypass.

BCBS.default_reason: Policy varies by state affiliate. Check local plan documents.

UnitedHealthcare.reason: Step therapy (Metformin) often required for T2D; PA required for weight loss.

Medicare.reason: Statutory Exclusion (MMA). Only covered for established CVD (Heart Attack/Stroke) + BMI > 27.

pricing_intelligence.savings_card_warning: Warning: 2025 Accumulator Adjustments may prevent this card from counting toward your deductible.
pricing_intelligence.compounding_warning: Regulatory Notice: FDA shortage resolutions have restricted access to $199 compounded pricing.
